page.title: 11The R.S.P.B. 4
page.content:
The work of the society is divided into three main fields. These are:
1. Conservation of Wild Birds and Habitats. This includes the acquisition of reserves, monitoring land use practices and pollution and the investigation of offences against birds under the Wildlife and Countryside Act.
2. Information and Education. This covers formal contacts through schools, informal contact via the Y.O.C., the production of educational material including films and videos and development of support for members.
3. Sales and Funding. Direct mail sales and via retail outlets.
